post.description: Returns a filtered list of Agents.

parameters.description: Only one of the parameters below must be set.
parameters.name: body

schema.description: Only one of the parameters below must be set.

node_id.description: Return only Agents that relate to a specific NodeID.

service_id.description: Return only Agents that relate to a specific ServiceID.

is_client_secret_set.description: True if Azure client secret is set.

comments_parsing_disabled.description: True if query comments parsing is disabled.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

expose_exporter.description: True if an exporter agent is exposed on all host addresses.

is_agent_password_set.description: True if the agent password is set.

is_aws_secret_key_set.description: True if AWS Secret Key is set.

is_connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

is_password_set.description: True if password for connecting the agent to the database is set.

max_query_log_size.description: Limit query log size in QAN.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

metrics_scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

enable_all_collectors.description: True if all collectors are enabled.

is_tls_certificate_key_file_password_set.description: True if TLS certificate file password is set.

is_tls_certificate_key_set.description: True if TLS certificate is set.

is_tls_key_set.description: True if TLS key is set.

is_ssl_key_set.description: True if TLS key is set.

push_metrics.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

query_examples_disabled.description: True if query examples are disabled.

rds_basic_metrics_disabled.description: True if RDS basic metrics are disdabled.

rds_enhanced_metrics_disabled.description: True if RDS enhanced metrics are disdabled.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

table_count_tablestats_group_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

custom_labels.description: Custom user-assigned labels for Node and Service.

node_model.description:
Represents a purchasable Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) under a product.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/partner-center/develop/product-resources#sku.

node_name.description: Unique across all Nodes user-defined name. Defaults to Azure Database instance ID.

qan.description: If true, adds qan-mysql-perfschema-agent or qan-postgresql-pgstatements-agent.

service_name.description: Unique across all Services user-defined name. Defaults to Azure Database instance ID.

tablestats_group_table_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors will be disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
If zero, server's default value is used.
Use negative value to disable them.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

type.description:
DiscoverAzureDatabaseType describes supported Azure Database instance engines.

 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL: MySQL type: microsoft.dbformysql or MariaDB type: microsoft.dbformariadb
 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_POSTGRESQL: PostgreSQL type: microsoft.dbformysql

post.description: Discovers Azure Database for MySQL, MariaDB and PostgreSQL Server instances.

items.description: DiscoverAzureDatabaseInstance models an unique Azure Database instance for the list of instances returned by Discovery.

address.description: Address used to connect to it.

node_model.description:
Represents a purchasable Stock Keeping Unit (SKU) under a product.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/partner-center/develop/product-resources#sku.

type.description:
DiscoverAzureDatabaseType describes supported Azure Database instance engines.

 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_MYSQL: MySQL type: microsoft.dbformysql or MariaDB type: microsoft.dbformariadb
 - DISCOVER_AZURE_DATABASE_TYPE_POSTGRESQL: PostgreSQL type: microsoft.dbformysql

post.description: Returns a single Node by ID.

agents.description: List of agents related to this node.

is_connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

container_id.description: A node's unique docker container identifier.

services.description: List of services running on this node.

items.description: Service represents a service running on a node.

status.description:
Node status.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid status.
 - STATUS_UP: The node is up.
 - STATUS_DOWN: The node is down.
 - STATUS_UNKNOWN: The node's status cannot be known (e.g. there are no metrics yet).

post.description: Returns a filtered list of Nodes.

agents.description: List of agents related to this node.

is_connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

container_id.description: A node's unique docker container identifier.

services.description: List of services running on this node.

items.description: Service represents a service running on a node.

status.description:
Node status.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Invalid status.
 - STATUS_UP: The node is up.
 - STATUS_DOWN: The node is down.
 - STATUS_UNKNOWN: The node's status cannot be known (e.g. there are no metrics yet).

post.description: Returns a filtered list of Services.

external_group.description: Return only services in this external group.

node_id.description: Return only Services running on that Node.

address.description:
Access address (DNS name or IP).
Address (and port) or socket is required.

agents.description: List of agents related to this service.

is_client_secret_set.description: True if Azure client secret is set.

comments_parsing_disabled.description: True if query comments parsing is disabled.

disabled.description: Desired Agent status: enabled (false) or disabled (true).

expose_exporter.description: True if an exporter agent is exposed on all host addresses.

is_agent_password_set.description: True if the agent password is set.

is_aws_secret_key_set.description: True if AWS Secret Key is set.

is_connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

is_password_set.description: True if password for connecting the agent to the database is set.

max_query_log_size.description: Limit query log size in QAN.

metrics_path.description: Path under which metrics are exposed, used to generate URI.

metrics_scheme.description: Scheme to generate URI to exporter metrics endpoints.

enable_all_collectors.description: True if all collectors are enabled.

is_tls_certificate_key_file_password_set.description: True if TLS certificate file password is set.

is_tls_certificate_key_set.description: True if TLS certificate is set.

is_tls_key_set.description: True if TLS key is set.

is_ssl_key_set.description: True if TLS key is set.

push_metrics.description: True if exporter uses push metrics mode.

query_examples_disabled.description: True if query examples are disabled.

rds_basic_metrics_disabled.description: True if RDS basic metrics are disdabled.

rds_enhanced_metrics_disabled.description: True if RDS enhanced metrics are disdabled.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

table_count_tablestats_group_limit.description:
Tablestats group collectors are disabled if there are more than that number of tables.
0 means tablestats group collectors are always enabled (no limit).
Negative value means tablestats group collectors are always disabled.

tls_skip_verify.description: Skip TLS certificate and hostname validation.

username.description: HTTP basic auth username for collecting metrics.

node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

node_name.description: Node name where this instance runs.

port.description:
Access port.
Port is required when the address present.

service_name.description: User-defined name unique across all Services.

socket.description:
Access unix socket.
Address (and port) or socket is required.

status.description:
Service status.

 - STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: In case we don't support the db vendor yet.
 - STATUS_UP: The service is up.
 - STATUS_DOWN: The service is down.
 - STATUS_UNKNOWN: The service's status cannot be known (e.g. there are no metrics yet).
